title: anivia compensation for the mana regen changes
body:
when dfg gets removed champs like ahri get instant fixes yet when the mana changes hit champs like anivia get nothing. you can have athenes and blue buff and still go oom almost instantly. season 4 anivia had mana problems but thats just how she is but season 5 her mana issues are just on a entire new level its not fun to be perma-oom. from start to finish its just rough.

{{champion:34}}

replies.body: Anivia has always required a Tear and an AUG. We can look waaaaaaaay back to the old days where Froggen was the most OP Anivia. Guess what he built?! Arch Angel's and an Athene's Unholy Grail. Can't adapt to the best Anivia's build? Well, there's always double 'nomicon.

You do understand that it is 2% of your max mana every 5 seconds

This means that if you have 2500 mana you get in effect 50 mana per 5 seconds.

Don't like it well too bad mana should be some kind of limit on a champs power and not something that you buy a item that is good all around and solve it.

Athene's has made season 3 and 4 really bland since if one champ change endlessly wave clear because of athene's then the game drags on for uch longer then it should.
If tear or RoA was part of your build in addition to Athenes (like it is for Anivia), then Athenes is actually stronger for her. Athene's was nerfed for those who only built Athene's.
